Top Reads for Your Arts Career

The Artist Statement: 5 Do’s and Don’ts

NYFA Staff read thousands of artist statements a year. Here is their advice on what to do, and what not to do.

How to Write An Effective Project Narrative

Actionable tips and advice for artists on how to organize, brainstorm, write, and edit project narratives.

Here's how to set goals and use your website and social media effectively, courtesy of Molaundo Jones, Founder of The Clever Agency and Senior Director of Communications and Partnerships at Art21.

From accessibility tips to content best practices: here's what you need to know before creating your website.
